content: this is a 3d cat house made with an 8 flower arrangement hoop for the mouth 4 mm macrame cord and a 5 5 mm hook it is worked in the round using invisible increases and decreases the tail and fins are made using half-double_crochet in the back loop only half_double_crochet blo to create a ridged appearance the finished project is 16 x16 x20 deep you can adjust the size by adding/removing increases so that the final product fits your cat s needs there s no strict gauge requirement but the front should be cone shaped rather than flat to keep things nice and smooth every time i tried to design this with a truly flat front i ended up with a wavy mess i ve included links to the materials i used to make this house but feel free to shop around to find different colors and the best deal cotton cord buy 2 https //www amazon com/gp/product/b08ckxztng/ref=ppx_yo_dt_b_asin_title_o06_s00 ie=utf8&psc=1 hoop https //www amazon com/gp/product/b0026hr0m6/ref=ppx_yo_dt_b_asin_title_o07_s01 ie=utf8&psc=1
